title: दंगा भड़काने और पत्थर मारने के लिए नहीं बल्कि पीड़ितों की मदद के लिए दिए जा रहे थे पैसे
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Remember the video circulated claiming people were paid money to go to Shaheen Bagh protest. Well I’m conclusively proving it as a lie, by shooting from the same location and with the person who gave the money and explaining for what reason, with corroborative video evidences. So watch it share it and please stop sharing fake news. Thanks a lot.
